name: Default Website Offer
subject: Boost Your {{business_type}} Business with a Professional Website
content:
Hi {{business_name}},

I noticed your successful {{business_type}} business in {{location}} while searching for local businesses, and I wanted to reach out because I saw you don't currently have a website.

In today's digital age, having a professional website can significantly impact your business by:
- Attracting new customers through Google searches
- Showcasing your services/products 24/7
- Building credibility and trust
- Reducing time spent answering common questions

I specialize in creating beautiful, effective websites for {{business_type}} businesses in {{location}}. I'd love to discuss how we could create a website that:
- Matches your brand perfectly
- Is easy for you to update
- Helps bring in more customers
- Works great on mobile phones

Would you be interested in a quick chat about how a website could help grow your business? I'm happy to share some examples of similar businesses I've helped.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}
{{company_name}}

P.S. If you're interested, I can show you a free mock-up of how your website could look!
